title: Crucible of War
description: Experience blistering science fiction adventure and pulse-pounding thrills with these never before published short stories and novellas set in the world of Warhammer 40,000!* Liberation Day - Matthew Farrer & Edward Rusk* The Curiosity - Dan Abnett* Payback - Graham McNeill* The Emperor's Will - David Charters* Fight or Flight - Sandy Mitchell* On Mournful Wings - Si Spurrier* Backcloth for a Crown Additional - Dan Abnett* Firestarter - Jonathan Green* Warp Spawn - Matt Ralphs* Leviathan - Graham McNeill
author: Marc Gascoigne
